channel.title: Lindsey Graham on Contact United States Senators and Governors

item.title: Lindsey Graham biograph
item.description: Senator Lindsey Graham Bio Senator Lindsey Olin Graham is an American lawyer and politician. He has been serving as a senior U.S. Senator from South Carolina under the Republicans since 2003. He was a member of the South Carolina House of Representatives from 1993 to 1995. He also served four terms in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1995 to 2003. He has recently served as the chair of the Senate Committee on the Judiciary from 2019 to 2021.
